records.action_name: CASE REPORT SENT AND DISPOSED LOCALLY
records.remarks: It is informed that ATR has been received from Jangpura Dispensary stating that an office order has been issued to all officers and staff with the instruction to be on their seats while on duty so that no inconvenience is faced by ESIC Beneficiaries. The complaint is treated as Disposed Of.
